titleStmt.title: Knavery in all trades, or, The coffee-house a comedy : as it was acted in the Christmas holidays by several apprentices with great applause.
titleStmt.author: Tatham, John, fl. 1632-1664.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.B. for W. Gilbertson and H. Marsh ...,

notesStmt.note: Authorship uncertain; generally attributed to John Tatham. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
